name: The Rest of Our Lives
storyline:
With the arrival of the wealthy Chuck Bing, the city is on fire as the most eligible bachelor has just hit the market. This is good news for Mrs. Bonnet who is looking to get her daughter Liz married off.

During their first meeting however, Liz meets Chuck's friend, Mr. Derby, and the two are immediately at each other's throats. Their fates are interwoven in this sexy tale of romance.
summary: An erotic kinetic novel(a visual novel with no choices) inspired by Pride and Prejudice.
